<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_824599_treat_man_group</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Ensure each record has unique group name</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_824599_treat_man_group');
    gr.get('group_name', current.group_name);
    if (gr.number != undefined) {
        gs.addErrorMessage('Record with this group_name already exists. Only one record can be created per group');
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-16 03:24:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9cc9afa687049110496499383cbb353a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Ensure each record has unique group name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Treat management" source="x_824599_treat_man">dc022bae87c09110496499383cbb35d3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Treat management">dc022bae87c09110496499383cbb35d3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9cc9afa687049110496499383cbb353a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-16 03:25:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9cc9afa687049110496499383cbb353a"/></record_update>
